data.Josef Pechal:
Josef Pechal is a 22-year-old Czech chorus actor who enjoys writing, adult colouring books and eating out. He is stable and creative, but can also be very cowardly and a bit moody.

He grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. After his father died when he was young, he was raised by his mother.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a cleaner called Marie Kotková, who was the same age as him. They broke up because Marie wanted to be with somebody less conventional.

Josef's best friend is a chorus actor called Nikola Borovcová. They get on well most of the time. He also hangs around with Otto Vašek and Anna Zoubková.

physical_characteristics.Other words that might be used: full-length, grandiloquent, leggy, long-legged, slim, stately, statuesque, tall

personality.Hobbies: writing, adult colouring books, eating out, planking, ferret racing, photography, worship

background.Early years: Josef grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. After his father died when he was young, he was raised by his mother.
background.Formative years: Josef got his first job as an extra at age 16. Josef dropped out of school.

nikola_borovcová.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

marie_kotková.Reason for breakup: Marie wanted to be with somebody less conventional

timeline.1999: Father, Petr Pechal dies aged 22 (car accident)
timeline.2013: Starts work at 20th Century Czech Republic Studios as an extra
timeline.2017: Resigns from job as an extra at 20th Century Czech Republic Studios. Starts work at The Minsqueak Theatre at a chorus actor
timeline.2018: Relationship with Marie Kotková ends (Marie wanted to be with somebody less conventional)
